sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Bring water to a boil in a pot. 2. Add Thai tea leaves and let it steep for 5 minutes. 3. Strain the tea into a pitcher and let it cool to room temperature. 4. Fill glasses with ice cubes. 5. Pour brewed tea over the ice. 6. Add sweetened condensed milk to taste and stir well. 7. Serve chilled.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Thai Tea Leaves (2 tbsp), Water (4 cups)</ingredients> <meal_type/> <name>Thai Iced Tea</name> <nutrition>Calories: 100, Protein: 1g, Fat: 5g, Carbs: 15g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Brew Thai tea leaves.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7491d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afe6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
